text: The Port of Tanjung Pelepas is a container port in Gelang Patah, Johor, Malaysia. It is part of the APM Terminals Global Terminal Network, which holds a minority share. The port was inaugurated on 13 March 2000 by Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad. ==References== Category:Ports and harbours Category:Johor
title: Port of Tanjung Pelepas
